data.name: Fantasy Grounds - Rippers Online Gaming Figure Flats (Token Pack)
data.detailed_description:
This online gaming product contains miniature tokens of heroes and monsters for your Rippers games.Included among the huge array of figures are almost every monster found in the miniatures or roleplaying version of this great spookily Savage Setting.

This product contains over 200 tokens for use with Rippers. There are multiple tokens for all tokens (close-ups and full figure), and addition tokens for creatures of varying sizes.

This token pack includes:

  • 2 Ripper Gents
  • 2 High Class Ripper
  • 2 Journalists
  • 2 Photographers
  • 2 Friars
  • 2 Low Class Rippers
  • 2 Entertainers
  • 2 Doctors
  • 4 Rippers
  • 2 Guard Officers
  • 2 Hired Guns
  • 2 Tomb Guards
  • 2 Diggers
  • 4 Explorers
  • 2 Headless Horsemen
  • 2 Minions of Set
  • 2 Cultists
  • 2 Scarecrows
  • 2 Pumpkin Jacks
  • 2 Servitor Mummys
  • 2 Royal Mummys
  • 2 Wolfmen
  • 2 Werewolves
  • 2 Concubines
  • 2 Cossacks
  • 2 Vampires
  • 2 Vampire Counts
  • 2 Nosferatu
  • 2 Vampire Lords
  • 2 Witchfinders
  • 2 Skeletons
  • 2 Ghosts
  • 4 Zombies
  • 2 Houngans
  • 2 Bokor
  • 2 Mambos
  • 2 Ape Hybrids
  • 2 Cat Hybrids
  • 2 Overseers
  • 4 Scientists
  • 2 Omega Beasts
  • 2 Piranha Hybrids
  • 2 Pig Hybrids
  • 2 Dog Hybrids
  • 11 Devil Dogs
  • 4 Horned Gods
  • 2 Bone Horror
  • 3 Gargoyles
  • 2 Witchs
  • 2 Peasants
  • 2 Night Guards
  • 6 Hydes
  • 3 Winged Fiends
  • 3 The Monsters
  • 4 Golems
  • 2 Invisible Men
  • 3 Yetis
  • 2 Lackys
  • 2 Henchmen
  • 2 Middle Class Gents
  • 2 School Teachers
  • 2 Scholars
  • 2 Vegeants
  • 4 Bloodhounds
  • 4 Witch Hunters
  • 4 Monster Hunters
  • 4 Gypsys
  • 2 Wolfen Jaegers
  • 2 Governesses
  • 2 Ladies of the Night
  • 4 High Class Gents
  • 4 Slayers
  • 2 Slayerettes
  • 2 High Class Lady
  • 2 Irregulars
  • 4 Low Class Gents
  • 4 Gadgeteers
  • 2 Militias
  • 2 Constables
  • 4 Warriors of St George
  • 2 Sisters of Mercy
  • 2 Monks
  • 2 Priests

Released on November 12, 2007. Designed for Fantasy Grounds version 2.9.9 and higher.

Requires: An active subscription or a one time purchase of a Fantasy Grounds Full or Ultimate license and any ruleset.

data.short_description: This online gaming product contains miniature tokens of heroes and monsters for your Rippers games.Included among the huge array of figures are almost every monster found in the miniatures or roleplaying version of this great spookily Savage Setting.This product contains over 200 tokens for use with Rippers.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7x , 8x or 10x
  • Processor: 1.6 GHz or higher processor
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card recommended
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: a sound card is required for voice communication using external programs like Google Hangouts, Skype or Discord.
  • Additional Notes: Requirements vary by the add-ons installed and the number of players connecting to your game.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7x , 8x or 10x
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz or higher processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX or OpenGL compatible card.
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: a sound card is required for voice communication using external programs like Google Hangouts, Skype or Discord.
  • Additional Notes: Requirements vary by the add-ons installed and the number of players connecting to your game.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.6.8 or newer
  • Processor: 1.6 GHz or higher processor
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card recommended
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: A sound card is required for voice communication using external programs like Google Hangouts, Skype or Discord.
  • Additional Notes: This product uses a wine wrapper to simplify installation
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 10.6.8 or newer
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz processor or higher
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9.0 compatible video adapter
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: A sound card is required for voice communication using external programs like Google Hangouts, Skype or Discord.
  • Additional Notes: This product uses a wine wrapper to simplify installation
